attributes.action: Access for Disabled / Pram users at Bredbury Train Station
attributes.additional_details:
Mother of twins unable to use the station for Public transport due to lack of facilities.

Once you have purchased your tickets there is no way of getting to the platform without walking up the stairs over the bridge, with a pram or anyone disabled who struggles with stairs,this is impossible.

Something needs to be done to change this access as a lot of people are restricted to go to Manchester using Bredbury Train Station.

Please sign if you would like make the station accessible to everyone.
